verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] asking an appeals court to restore his power to block critics on Twitter .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: asking] [ARG2: an appeals court] [ARG1: to restore his power to block critics on Twitter] .
President Donald Trump is asking [ARG0: an appeals court] to [V: restore] [ARG1: his power to block critics on Twitter] .
President Donald Trump is asking [ARG0: an appeals court] to restore his power to [V: block] [ARG1: critics on Twitter] .
